sentence: The Michigan Court of Appeals unanimously denied a request from businessman Perry Johnson to provide him a path back onto the ballot.
author: Jon King
title: Michigan 'quality guru' Perry Johnson remains off August primary ballot after unanimous court ruling

title: Michigan GOP gov. candidates infuse debate with conspiracies about Whitmer and voting
